statements: DELETE FROM waste_transportation WHERE route_name = 'City Route';
DELETE FROM waste_transportation WHERE route_id = 100 AND route_name = 'Garbage Pickup Route'
DELETE FROM waste_transportation WHERE end_location = 'Landfill' AND schedule_time < '08:00:00'
DELETE FROM waste_transportation_routes WHERE distance > 1000 AND vehicle_type = 'Truck';
DELETE FROM WasteRoutes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
DELETE FROM WasteDisposal WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill' AND disposal_cost > 1000;
DELETE FROM WasteCollection WHERE route_name = 'Route A' AND pickup_time < '2022-01-01';
